title: How to manage/disable Android Slices
content:
Since upgrading to Android 10 my settings page is cluttered with useless Android 'slices'.

I have every setting checked to disable WiFi scanning, yet if my WiFi is on and I open settings it shows me available WiFi networks to connect to.

If I turn off WiFi to get rid of the slices I then get a slice informing me that WiFi is turned off? I know its, I turned it off.

Possibly the worst part is the slices don't actually render straight away, so I open settings and click the option I want, then the slices render and push everything down and the option I have already pressed is replaced with something different so I get taken to a screen I never wanted. Pretty good efficiencies Google.
